title: MediaCapture.capturePhotoToStorageFileAsync has memory leak
body: I have a cordova app which works fine on Windows 8.1 platform, but on Windows Phone 8.1. the app crashes frequently after taking multiple pictures. After profiling the app I found that after calling MediaCapture.capturePhotoToStorageFileAsync method, memory is not released and allocates 10-20 MB with each call.
